item.description:
Please join us for awesome movie night and help us welcome out new members! Movie Nights will be held once a month (4th Sunday of the month) where we will watch cultural/educational movies in a fun/social setting.

Popcorn and some beverages and snacks will be provided by the club, but everyone is welcome to bring additional snacks to share!

Movie: Persepolis

Poignant coming-of-age story of a precocious and outspoken young Iranian girl that begins during the Islamic Revolution.
item.how_to_find_us: Follow signs for Boston Rotaract to the Trustee Reading Room!

group.name: Boston Rotaract - A Service/Social Club for 18-30 Yr Olds

item.name: International Movie Night and Induction
